entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
